Text: US Airways One Day Fare SaleDear Mathew I know youve heard about a ton of fare sales lately but heres one you must check out if there is even the slightest possibility you might be traveling November through March Were talking great deals to most US Airways destinations when you purchase your ticket by midnight tonight Monday November More details promosusdTRAVELOCITYhtml Here are sample fares from Rochester NY to Las Vegas NV to Seattle WA to San Francisco CA Visit friends and family for the holidays Wrap up end of year business or plan your first trip for the New Year Whatever your plans I hope you have an opportunity to take advantage of these great fares Have a safe and happy holiday Chris Monroe wwwtravelocitycom Go Virtually Anywhere DONT FORGET THE RULES Tickets must be purchased by Midnight Central Time on November Fares are based on roundtrip coach travel Tickets must be purchased days in advance and within hours of making your reservation All travel must be complete by March Fares valid for travel Monday Thursday Saturday night stay is required Maximum day stay Fare not valid for travel on the dates of or Tickets are nonrefundable hours after making reservation Unsubscribe Occasionally we use email to communicate special offers to our members If you prefer not to receive these please visit the following link and click the Continue button promoptoutctlemail Password LookUp Follow this link and well help you retrieve your password lognpwdformctl If you have any other questions simply reply to this email with the original message attached and ask our Customer Service Center
